## ModelFormModule class

Responsible for declaring components and providing core injectables. Use forFeature function to configure a default save converter for each feature module.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ModelFormModule 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [forFeature(defaultSaveConverter)](./model-form.modelformmodule.forfeature.md) | <code>static</code> |  |
